body: Not sure grooming works the same in hentai
That age gap/progression doesnt really work though... in the first she looks like what? maybe 4 years older? and in the last one she looks like she is in her mid thirtees while he looks like 16

@Cincico it is. just another gimmick. Like there are one manga where 2 character marrige and dying old together and be like wee still friend right ?
unless the author later show otherwise, this is exactly same shit.  the girl start "teach" him when she also young, she will also grow so she is always the older one. But you look at that, they basically have the procession that of normal couple

Is this supposed to make me feel wholesomeness? I can't shake off the feeling that she's gonna be using him
:(
Brainwashing at it most finest no need to use some phone app or a coin on a string just not even a lighter or match. lol
Man you should put in brainwash tag….she groomed him from a young age
man i want both of them to end up together

Connection Terminated. I'm sorry to interrupt you Elizabeth, if you still even remember that name, but I'm afraid you've been misinformed. You are not here to receive a gift, nor have you been called here by the individual you assume, although you have indeed been called. You have all been called here into a labyrinth of sounds and smells, misdirection and misfortune. A labyrinth with no exit, a maze with no prize. You don't even realize that you are trapped. Your lust for blood has driven you in endless circles chasing the cries of children in some unseen chamber, always seeming so near, yet somehow out of reach. But you will never find them. None of you will. This is where your story ends. And to you, my brave volunteer, who somehow found this job listing not intended for you. Although there was a way out planned for you, I have a feeling that's not what you want. I have a feeling that you are right where you want to be. I am remaining as well, I am nearby. This place will not be rem
This gem again with extra content? Faved
